RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE JULY 3, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pr ice $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLY SAINT battled for the lead along the inside for a half, shook clear when put to right handed urging near mid stretch and won under a hand ride. O CIGANO with the second flight inside, had a mild late rally and finished clear for second. TWICE AS SMART dueled for the lead two wide to the top of the stretch then weakened. TUFF ATTACK with the second flight two wide, was through after a half. KHALFANI trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: O Cigano
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Saint
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, shook clear upper stretch, right urging, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: K P SILVER BULLET never far back, drifted to the five path entering the stretch, rallied under right handed urging and got up in the final strides. MURTAGH dueled for the lead two wide for a half, shook clear entering the stretch, set the balance of the pace and just failed. BAD LITTLE BEAST passed a tiring rival in the six path. SMUDGE THE CAT battled with the runner up along the inside for a half then weakened. THE WILD FLYER trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: K P Silver Bullet
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, long drive, 5path, up in final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Murtagh
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2w, shook clear top lane, caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. S uch A Race Since May 3 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON BUNS was hung five wide into the clubhouse turn, allowed to settle, closed willingly three wide under right handed urging through the stretch while in the five path, made the lead late and edged clear. ANNMARIA away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the far turn, gave up the advantage, regained the leader in upper stretch then couldn't handle the winner. HIGH FIRE slow early, found her best stride late in the two path. RIGHT TRAPPE pressed the pace two wide for five furlongs, made the lead, set the pace to the top of the stretch then came up empty. SHE'S CRAFTY failed to menace. INCESSANT stalked the pace from the four path into the far turn then faded. SIERRA DIAMOND settled inside off the pace and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Annmaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, headed, came again, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Right Trappe
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led 2nd turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: She's Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Buns
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide first turn, settled, closed willingly, 3 wide, 5p, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 34. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEE'S KY WILDCAT allowed to settle, responded readily when set down, rallied inside rivals under left handed urging to make the lead near the furlong marker and drew clear under brisk handling. MY TWO JAKES chased the pace through the turn, rallied two wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack despite right handed urging and couldn't handle the winner. ANGEL'S DESTINY stalked the early pace, loomed boldly three wide into the stretch, was carried out to the middle of the racetrack and was outfinished. SHESANOTHERSONG broke in front, set the pace to the top of the stretch then weakened. WICKED REESE well placed, failed to respond. RIVERANDFAIRMOUNT was fractious in the gate then no threat. GOLD APPEAL threw her head as the gate opened, hit the gate and had brief speed. LISTEN LINDA LOU trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied 2 wide, led top lane, drifted mid track, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Ky Wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, full of run, inside, late lead, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Shesanothersong
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Angel's Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 3 wide top lane, carried wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE JULY 3, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 3 All owed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALGORIX chased the lead in the four path into the stretch, was carried out to the seven path by that one, dug in determinedly and got up in the final strides. UNIDENTIFIED MAN sped to the lead three wide on the first turn, set the pace into the stretch, drifted out to the six path despite right handed urging the couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. SAY HEY KID went evenly. GEH SCHNELL failed to menace. OPEN OUT was no factor. KLAATU lead briefly along the inside into the clubhouse turn then was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Klaatu
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief lead inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Algorix
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4path, carried out 7path, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Unidentified Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead 3 wide, set pace, drifted out right urging, caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 3 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12 ,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TYRONA sprinted up the inside to make the lead entering the clubhouse turn, opened up a large advantage under a hold before a half, set all the pace, drifted out through the stretch under mild right handed urging and prevailed under confident handling. CANDYMONIUM unhurried inside, closed willingly on far turn and finished clear for second. SAKONNA slow early, found her best stride late inside. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN improved position entering the stretch then was outfinished. GRACIE DANCE chased the winner into the far turn then gave way. UNESCORTED was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Tyrona
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, drew off backstretch, drifted lane, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Thomas Scucci, Renee Scucci,Dividing Ridge Farm LLC & Doug

ENTRY.NAME: Candymonium
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried inside, closed willingly, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Unescorted
ENTRY.OWNER: Mace Ed and Urieta's Racing Stable

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 61. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 3 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12, 500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KISS VALENTINA broke in full stride to set all the pace and maintained her advantage under right then left handed urging. DEW IT WITH STYLE prompted the pace two wide and finished second best. RATATAT stalked the pace along the inside, shifted out to the five path entering the stretch then finished with good courage. KAT TRAX well placed, failed to respond. CRIMSON LEGION was no factor. ROARING GINGER had good early speed then faded. TITEBLUEJEANS was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, held well, left handed urging,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 3 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YEARS AGO prompted the pace two wide into the stretch, made the lead in upper stretch and proved best under brisk handling. MITESSE away alertly, set the pace along the inside to the top of the stretch and finished second best. TIME FOR CUPID settled inside and had a mild late rally in the three path. DREAM TO WIN vied for the lead three wide into the stretch and drifted out late while tiring. MAY BEAU close up four wide, was carried wide in deep stretch and weakened. DANZING CHICK was fractious in the gate and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Dream to Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, drifted mid track, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Years Ago
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: May Beau
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4 wide, through after half, carried wide

ENTRY.NAME: Mitesse
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace upper stretch, second best,
